vote.title: Authorize (1) Amendment No. 1 to the Project Specific Agreement with Dallas County, County Transportation Major Capital Improvement Projects 10233, for the purpose of providing funding for the Trinity Forest Spine Trail Phase 2 from the Santa Fe Trail just north of Tenison Park Golf Course to the Dallas Area Rapid Transit Lawnview Station located at 5900 Scyene Road; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds from Dallas County in an amount not to exceed $2,000,000.00 for the County's share of the project cost in the Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund; and (3) execution of the agreement including all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Estimated Revenue: Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund $2,000,000.00
vote.description: Authorize (1) Amendment No. 1 to the Project Specific Agreement with Dallas County, County Transportation Major Capital Improvement Projects 10233, for the purpose of providing funding for the Trinity Forest Spine Trail Phase 2 from the Santa Fe Trail just north of Tenison Park Golf Course to the Dallas Area Rapid Transit Lawnview Station located at 5900 Scyene Road; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds from Dallas County in an amount not to exceed $2,000,000.00 for the County's share of the project cost in the Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund; and (3) execution of the agreement including all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Estimated Revenue: Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund $2,000,000.00
